core_meaning: Square between Sun and Mars drives friction/work. Sun: ego, identity, authority, vitality, purpose, visibility. Mars: drive, assertion, surgery, mechanics, conflict. General tenor: growth via friction; endurance and clear boundaries are key.

facets.career: Authority, recognition, leadership, alignment with purpose.  Execution speed, competition, technical grit. Emphasis: friction/work.
facets.relationships: Self-respect, healthy boundaries, paternal figures.  Desire, boundaries, anger management. Emphasis: friction/work.
facets.money: Status-linked income, government/authority-linked gains.  Risk-capital, decisive investments, initiative-led gains. Emphasis: friction/work.
facets.health_adj: Heart, vitality, heat regulation; consider circadian rhythm.  Inflammation, accidents; channel via training. Emphasis: friction/work.

risk_notes: Friction escalating into conflict; respect pacing and boundaries.
Impulsive actions or accidents; channel energy into training.

applying: Prepare and initiate aligned actions; set intent and book resources. (Sun: lead, present, decide; Mars: execute, train, assert; tone: friction/work).
Skill-up or pre-negotiate; clear blockers proactively. (Sun: lead, present, decide; Mars: execute, train, assert; tone: friction/work).
exact: Announce, pitch, launch, or sign; maximize visibility. (Sun: lead, present, decide; Mars: execute, train, assert; tone: friction/work).
Make the decisive call; accept/decline offers consciously. (Sun: lead, present, decide; Mars: execute, train, assert; tone: friction/work).
separating: Consolidate gains, document learnings, adjust guardrails. (Sun: lead, present, decide; Mars: execute, train, assert; tone: friction/work).
Close loops, stabilize routines, prune scope creep. (Sun: lead, present, decide; Mars: execute, train, assert; tone: friction/work).

dignity_adjustment.notes: Optional: adjust weights by sign/hse dignity e.g., exalt/debilitation.

retrograde_adjustment.notes: Optional: if either planet retrograde, temper extroversion; increase review loops.
